name: Scaylextricks Manager '21
description:
Scaylextricks Manager ’21 is a short interactive fiction about the vulnerability of childhood, the inevitability of fate, and the hypnotic power of slot car racing.

Content warning — contains disturbing scenes and references to child abuse.

Written and drawn by Josh Holton

Music by Hugh Holton

RG HO Slot Car with Crashes.wav sound by CMUsounddesign

https://freesound.org/people/cmusounddesign/sounds/95848/
